TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public interface auto ansi abstract ViewTreeObserver/IOnGlobalFocusChangeListener implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the focus state within the view tree changes.

remarks.para: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the focus state within the view tree changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnGlobalFocusChanged (Android.Views.View oldFocus, Android.Views.View newFocus);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnGlobalFocusChanged(class Android.Views.View oldFocus, class Android.Views.View newFocus) cil managed

Docs.param: The previously focused view, if any.
The newly focused View, if any.
Docs.summary: Callback method to be invoked when the focus changes in the view tree.

remarks.para: Callback method to be invoked when the focus changes in the view tree. When the view tree transitions from touch mode to non-touch mode, oldFocus is null. When the view tree transitions from non-touch mode to touch mode, newFocus is null. When focus changes in non-touch mode (without transition from or to touch mode) either oldFocus or newFocus can be null.
